MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch affecting properties in Redbrae Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repir to our underground cable network, our engineers have had to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:25pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 01:19pm on the 18th of December 2020.
